inclusion.criterion: Diagnosis of obstructive sleep apnoea-hypopnoea syndrome (OSAHS)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Epworth Sleepiness Scale score of 11 or greater
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Oxygen Desaturation Index of 20 or greater (and/or oxygen desaturation index/apnoea-hypopnoea index greater than 0.67)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Naive to Continuous Positive Airway Pressure (CPAP) treatment, or CPAP intolerant
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Moderate to large Patent Foramen Ovale (PFO) as seen on a transthoracic echocardiogram bubble study
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Weight >180kg (maximum weight allowance for echocardiogram table)
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has multifactorial chronic hypoxemia and dyspnea thought due to diastolic CHF, pulmonary hypertension thought secondary to a chronic ASD and COPD on 5L home oxygen. Cardiology consult recommended a right heart cath for evaluation of response to sildenafil but the patient refused.
